items.name: Karjat Escape: A Pool, A Forest & A Story
items.description: Leave behind the city buzz and dive into a chill forest resort in Karjat – swim, eat local, hear stories from villagers, and return refreshed in 24 hours.

items.name: Igatpuri Bliss – Hills, Homes & Heart
items.description: Stay in a cozy hillside bungalow, walk through misty trails, and experience Igatpuri's peaceful charm the LokYatri way.

items.name: Bhandardara Stories & Stars
items.description: Enjoy stargazing, lakeside walks, and warm local meals in a peaceful village homestay near Bhandardara.

items.name: Lonavala Unfiltered
items.description: Beyond the crowded spots – explore Lonavala like a local with hidden trails, real food, and cozy stays.

items.name: Panvel Peace Camp
items.description: A relaxed day with nature, fresh air, and organic food near Karnala – guided by locals and full of calm.

items.name: Pawna Under the Stars
items.description: Camp by the lake, light a bonfire, enjoy barbecue meals and vibe under the starry Pawna sky.

items.name: Matheran Retreat – No Roads, Just Peace
items.description: Stay at Alexander resort in car-free Matheran, take scenic treks, and reconnect with nature's simplicity.

items.name: Revdanda Beach Nights
items.description: Fall asleep to ocean waves, dance by the bonfire, and eat fresh seafood – beach camping at its best.

items.name: Alibaug Staycation – Chill at the Coast
items.description: Your private weekend in a beautiful bungalow with beach walks, seafood, and complete peace.
